verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H4428><s%>, when all the kings of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, that were beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>, and all the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, that were by the sea <S%H3220><s%>, heard <S%H8085><s%> how that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had dried up <S%H3001><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, until we were passed over <S%H5674><s%>, that their heart <S%H3824><s%> melted <S%H4549><s%>, neither was there spirit <S%H7307><s%> in them any more <S%H6440><s%>, because of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

At that time <S%H6256><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, Make <S%H6213><s%> thee knives <S%H2719><s%> of flint <S%H6697><s%>, and circumcise <S%H4135><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> the second time <S%H8145><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> him knives <S%H2719><s%> of flint <S%H6697><s%>, and circumcised <S%H4135><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> at the hill <S%H1389><s%> of the foreskins <S%H6190><s%>.

And this is the cause <S%H1697><s%> why Joshua <S%H3091><s%> did circumcise <S%H4135><s%>: all the people <S%H5971><s%> that came forth out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, that were males <S%H2145><s%>, even all the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>, died <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%>, after they came forth out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

For <S%H3588><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%> that came out <S%H3318><s%> were circumcised <S%H4135><s%>; but all the people <S%H5971><s%> that were born <S%H3209><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> as they came forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, they had not circumcised <S%H4135><s%>.

For the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, till all the nation <S%H1471><s%>, even the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> that came forth out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, were consumed <S%H8552><s%>, because they hearkened <S%H8085><s%> not unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: unto whom Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> that he would not let them see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%> that he would give <S%H5414><s%> us <S%H776><s%>, a land flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>.

And their children <S%H1121><s%>, whom he raised up <S%H6965><s%> in their stead <S%H3091><s%>, them did Joshua circumcise <S%H4135><s%>: for they were uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%>, because they had not circumcised <S%H4135><s%> them by the way <S%H1870><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H8552><s%>, when they had done circumcising <S%H4135><s%> all the nation <S%H1471><s%>, that they abode <S%H3427><s%> in their places in the camp <S%H4264><s%>, till they were whole <S%H2421><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, This day <S%H3117><s%> have I rolled away <S%H1556><s%> the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> from off you <S%H8034><s%>. Wherefore the name of that place <S%H4725><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>, unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>; and they kept <S%H6213><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> on the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%>.

And they did eat <S%H398><s%> of the produce <S%H5669><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> on the morrow <S%H4283><s%> after the passover <S%H6453><s%>, unleavened cakes <S%H4682><s%> and parched <S%H7033><s%> grain <S%H6106><s%>, in the selfsame day <S%H3117><s%>.

And the manna <S%H4478><s%> ceased <S%H7673><s%> on the morrow <S%H4283><s%>, after they had eaten <S%H398><s%> of the produce <S%H5669><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>; neither had the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> manna <S%H4478><s%> any more <S%H398><s%>; but they did eat of the fruit <S%H8393><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> that year <S%H8141><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H3091><s%>, when Joshua was by Jericho <S%H3405><s%>, that he lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> and looked <S%H7200><s%>, and <S%H5975><s%>, behold, there stood a man <S%H376><s%> over against him with his sword <S%H2719><s%> drawn <S%H8025><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>: and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, and said unto him <S%H6862><s%>, Art thou for us, or for our adversaries?

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Nay <S%H8269><s%>; but as prince of the host <S%H6635><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> am I now come <S%H935><s%>. And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on his face <S%H6440><s%> to the earth <S%H776><s%>, and did worship <S%H7812><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, What saith my lord <S%H113><s%> unto his servant <S%H5650><s%>?

And the prince <S%H8269><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s host <S%H6635><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, Put off <S%H5394><s%> thy shoe <S%H5275><s%> from off thy foot <S%H7272><s%>; for the place <S%H4725><s%> whereon thou standest <S%H5975><s%> is holy <S%H6944><s%>. And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> did so <S%H6213><s%>.
